meanings: (군대) the US armed forces, the US Army[troops], American forces, (병사) American soldier[sailor, airman], (Am) GI
the reduction of the US Forces in Korea

vlive.korean: 저번엔 폐 병원, 이번엔 미군 부대. Lung hospital then and US army base this time. 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST W] L.O.Λ.E RECORD B-Side EP.05
